Desc.entry: A traditional evangelical church. Annual events include a Flower Festival weekend in July, a Harvest Festival in October, a Christmas Carol Service and Easter Service. Also have a supper club throughout the summer months which includes a 3 course meal and a speaker, please contact for details.

ContactName.entry: Mr J Youdan/Mrs S Youdan, Pastors
